item.title: Job Shell
item.description: my shell snippets. # view other login user w # view own teletypewriter tty # view host's working time uptime # view listening port ( TCP, UDP, unix socket respectively ) netstat -tnl netstat -unl netstat -xnl ########################### # Apache Log grep ########################### # limit by date (calendar) grep "08/Dec/2007" # limit by hour (example: 22 o'clock) grep "08/Dec/2007:22:" # get DNS server cat /etc/resolv.conf ( grep "nameserver" ) # view services systemctl list-unit-files -t service | grep "enabled" # ZABBIX zabbix_get -s $AGENTIP -k system.

item.title: Myprofile

item.title: Second
item.description: Today, I will show you some my old story. It’s a boring and keeping you sleppy. good .
